org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.feedforward.autoencoder

Class AutoEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.AbstractLayer<LayerConfT>
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BaseLayer<LayerConfT>
        • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BasePretrainNetwork<AutoEncoder>
          • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.feedforward.autoencoder.AutoEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Layer, Model, Trainable

    public class AutoEncoder
extends BasePretrainNetwork<AutoEncoder>
    Autoencoder. Add Gaussian noise to input and learn a reconstruction function.
    See Also:
